did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: George Mason University. Special Collections and Archives.

did.unittitle: Edward M. Peach historical newspaper collection
did.abstract: This collection contains selected newspapers, including the Evening Star, the New York Herald Tribune, the New York Times, the Egyptian Mail, and the French newspaper, Le Journal du Dimanche. Topics covered include the assassinations of John F. Kennedy and Robert Kennedy and the resignation of Richard Nixon.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: There are no restrictions on personal use. Permission to publish material from the Edward M. Peach historical newspaper collection must be obtained from Special Collections Research Center, George Mason University Libraries.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Edward M. Peach historical newspaper collection, C0103, Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Collection donated by Edward Peach in 2003.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Special Collections and Archives staff. EAD markup completed by Eron Ackerman and Jordan Patty in August 2009.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains selected newspapers, including the Evening Star, the New York Herald Tribune, the New York Times, the Egyptian Mail, and the French newspaper, Le Journal du Dumanche. Topics covered include the assassinations of John F. Kennedy and Robert Kennedy and the resignation of Richard Nixon.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Special Collections and Archives also holds many other collections on 20th century political history.

did.unittitle: An electronic box inventory is unavailable. Please contact speccoll@gmu.edu for more information.
